articles.title: Sarah Michelle Gellar Remembers ‘Buffy’ Co-Star Michelle Trachtenberg: “I Will Live… For You” - Deadline
articles.description: Sarah Michelle Gellar has paid tribute to her former Buffy The Vampire Slayer co-star Michelle Trachtenberg following her death Wednesday at 39.
articles.content:
Sarah Michelle Gellar has paid tribute to her former Buffy The Vampire Slayer co-star Michelle Trachtenberg following her death Wednesday at the age of 39.
